oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Technical challenges from the production to the transformation : elements for debate.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BOCQUIER, F.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Synthetic overview of the first workshop "technical challenges in organic agriculture from the production to the transformation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: BOCQUIER, F. (2009) Technical challenges from the production to the transformation : elements for debate. [Défis techniques de la production à la transformation : éléments de débat.] Carrefours de l'Innovation Agronomique, 4, pp. 1-7.
